title: Xiang Yun Vegetarian Hut - Bayan Point
typeOfFood: Lacto, Chinese, Fast food, Take-out, Malaysian
description: 香雲素食坊 has a few branches. This one serves a variety of dishes, from set meal and western food to dessert. Also open if 1st or 15th of month fall on Tuesday.
streetAddress: 17-G-31, Medan Kampung Relau, MK12 Bayan Point, Bayan Lepas
